statements: SELECT * FROM sea_level_data;
SELECT location, sea_level_height FROM sea_level_data WHERE sea_level_height > 3.5;
SELECT location, erosion_level FROM sea_level_data WHERE erosion_level = 'high';
SELECT * FROM sea_level_data WHERE date_recorded BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT id, location, date_recorded FROM sea_level_data ORDER BY date_recorded DESC;
SELECT location, sea_level_height FROM sea_level_data WHERE sea_level_height > 2.5 ORDER BY location DESC
SELECT * FROM sea_level_data WHERE erosion_level = 'High' ORDER BY date_recorded ASC
SELECT id, location, sea_level_height, date_recorded FROM sea_level_data WHERE date_recorded BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY id
SELECT location, erosion_level FROM sea_level_data WHERE sea_level_height >= 3 AND erosion_level IN ('Moderate', 'High') ORDER BY sea_level_height DESC, location
SELECT AVG(sea_level_height) AS avg_sea_level_height, erosion_level FROM sea_level_data GROUP BY erosion_level HAVING avg_sea_level_height > 2.0 ORDER BY avg_sea_level_height DESC
SELECT * FROM sea_level_rise_data ORDER BY measurement_date DESC;
SELECT location_id, sea_level_height FROM sea_level_rise_data WHERE sea_level_height > 5;
SELECT * FROM sea_level_rise_data WHERE location_id = 3;
SELECT location_id, sea_level_height, measurement_date FROM sea_level_rise_data WHERE measurement_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT location_id, sea_level_height FROM sea_level_rise_data WHERE sea_level_height BETWEEN 3.5 AND 7.5;
SELECT location_id, sea_level_height, measurement_date FROM sea_level_rise_data WHERE sea_level_height > 5 ORDER BY measurement_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sea_level_height, location_id FROM sea_level_rise_data WHERE measurement_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT erosion_rate, erosion_area FROM coastal_erosion_data WHERE erosion_rate < 2.5 ORDER BY erosion_area ASC;
SELECT * FROM sea_level_rise_data WHERE location_id = 1001;
SELECT location_id, erosion_rate, measurement_date FROM coastal_erosion_data WHERE measurement_date >= '2020-01-01' ORDER BY location_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM SeaLevelData;
SELECT Location, SeaLevel FROM SeaLevelData WHERE MeasurementDate = '2022-01-01';
SELECT Location, MeasurementDate FROM SeaLevelData WHERE SeaLevel > 3.5;
SELECT AVG(SeaLevel) AS AverageSeaLevel FROM SeaLevelData;
SELECT Location, ErosionRate FROM CoastalErosionData ORDER BY ErosionRate DESC;
SELECT * FROM SeaLevelData ORDER BY MeasurementDate ASC, SeaLevel DESC;
SELECT Location, MeasurementDate, SeaLevel FROM SeaLevelData WHERE SeaLevel > 1.5;
SELECT Location, COUNT(*) AS TotalMeasurements FROM CoastalErosionData GROUP BY Location HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
SELECT PlanDescription, StartDate, EndDate FROM AdaptationPlan WHERE EndDate > '2022-12-31' ORDER BY StartDate DESC;

SELECT SeaLevelData.Location, CoastalErosionData.Location, SeaLevel, ErosionRate FROM SeaLevelData INNER JOIN CoastalErosionData ON SeaLevelData.Location = CoastalErosionData.Location ORDER BY SeaLevel DESC, ErosionRate DESC;
SELECT * FROM Sea_Level_Rise_Data ORDER BY sea_level_height DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, sea_level_height FROM Sea_Level_Rise_Data WHERE location = 'Miami' AND sea_level_height > 3.5;
SELECT id, location, measurement_date FROM Sea_Level_Rise_Data WHERE sea_level_height < 0.0 ORDER BY measurement_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Coastal_Erosion_Data WHERE erosion_rate BETWEEN 0.5 AND 1.0;
SELECT station_name, location FROM Monitoring_Station WHERE installation_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM Sea_Level_Rise_Data ORDER BY measurement_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT location, sea_level_height FROM Sea_Level_Rise_Data WHERE sea_level_height > 2.0;
SELECT station_name, installation_date FROM Monitoring_Station WHERE location = 'Beach';
SELECT * FROM Coastal_Erosion_Data WHERE measurement_date >= '2021-01-01' AND measurement_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT strategy, recommended_action FROM Adaptation_Planning ORDER BY strategy ASC;
SELECT * FROM sea_level_rise_data;
SELECT id, location, sea_level_height FROM sea_level_rise_data ORDER BY sea_level_height DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, budget FROM adaptation_projects WHERE budget > 50000;
SELECT location, erosion_rate FROM coastal_erosion_data WHERE erosion_rate <= 0.5;
SELECT name, job_title FROM personnel WHERE job_title LIKE 'Researcher%';
SELECT * FROM sea_level_rise_data WHERE sea_level_height > 3.8;
SELECT location, date FROM sea_level_rise_data WHERE date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT location, erosion_rate FROM coastal_erosion_data ORDER BY erosion_rate DESC;
SELECT project_name, budget FROM adaptation_projects WHERE budget >= 50000.00;
SELECT name, job_title, contact_info FROM personnel WHERE job_title LIKE '%engineer%';
